entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 2:55 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
